page.title: 13Transport in Hartington
page.content: A parked vehicle survey. There were more cars parked in the afternoon than in the morning - 43 in the morning and 56 in the afternoon. These are all the vehicles that were parked in Hartington, cars, vans, lorries, tractor, coaches. There were more vehicles parked in the afternoon as lots of people come to look round the village. We did a survey to find out how people went out of Hartington. Our survey was for 15 minutes on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. People walked, cycled, went in cars, vans and lorries. Most people travelled out on Wednesday. The least number of people travelled out on Friday. Most people travelled out in cars.
